item.title: Tel3Advantage Valentine Calling Special
item.description: This Valentine’s Day, stay connected with loved ones abroad without breaking the bank. Tel3Advantage offers incredibly affordable international calling rates, and signing up by February 20th gets you a 30% discount for a month, plus $3 in free talk time. Known for its budget-friendly rates, Tel3 offers calls to the USA for a mere 1.4 cents per minute. Calls to the U.K. are only 1.8 cents per minute, and even traditionally expensive destinations like China are only 1.
